availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph M. Kirkland (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lydia Kirkland. Father of Nancy E. Kirkland, Serena Kirkland, Philip Kirkland, Rachel Kirkland, John Kirkland, Robert Kirkland, Albert Kirkland, and Mary Kirkland. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 50.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Willisburg Precinct, p. 26.
Find A Grave, "Joseph M. Kirkland (October 4, 1828-March 4, 1905)," Memorial #31224389, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31224389 (accessed May 29, 2018).
